amendment.description: To provide funding for critical hazardous fuels and forest health projects to reduce the risk of catastrophic fires and mitigate the effects of widespread insect infestations.

action.text: Amendment SA 3645 ruled out of order by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3645.

Amendment SA 3645 proposed by Senator Salazar. (consideration: CR S3668-3669; text: CR S3668) To provide funding for critical hazardous fuels and forest health projects to reduce the risk of catastrophic fires and mitigate the effects of widespread insect infestations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3645 proposed by Senator Salazar.
